subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Another tuner--It's a Sony! [8 Attachments]
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Okay then, this makes me step back and ask WTF? I think hear something,
post what I thought I heard, then listen the next day, and it's nothing but
broadcast frags. In #6 now "frank's ol' lady---wormwood...", and 8, "he's
got a good idea...." Ya have to be able to ask, what if it is all just
brain? If no one in the world hears the same sutff, is it valid? and who
thinks their hearing is so much more superior to anyone else's that they can
tell what it really says. So far, these other experts seem to hear only
frags.  All I can figure is that we get enough to show others, and ourselves
that something is going on, but most of the communication is just using the
sounds being used as a psychic prop--in the brain. It does not mean the
communication is invalid, or what one hears false. It just means it's more
personal, and not provable. Round and round, till one finally breaks loose,
and hits this wall. I find myself questioning this stuff more and more.

 I don't know what to think anymore, I came up with this braindead box idea,
and it seems to work for everyone except me. I'm thinkin' I wasted my IT
career for this crap.

F-S

>

> that's a trip, cuz I was switching between AM and FM.
>
> F-S
